verses.text: I \w waited|strong="H6960"\w* \w patiently|strong="H6960"\w* for the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; and he \w inclined|strong="H5186"\w* unto me, and \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* my \w cry|strong="H7775"\w*.\f + \fr 40.1 \ft I waited…: Heb. In waiting I waited\f*

He brought me \w up|strong="H5927"\w* also out of an \w horrible|strong="H7588"\w* \w pit|strong="H0953"\w*, out of the \w miry|strong="H3121"\w* \w clay|strong="H2916"\w*, and \w set|strong="H6965"\w* my \w feet|strong="H7272"\w* upon a \w rock|strong="H5553"\w*, \add and\add* \w established|strong="H3559"\w* my \w goings|strong="H0838"\w*.\f + \fr 40.2 \ft an…: Heb. a pit of noise\f*

And he hath \w put|strong="H5414"\w* a \w new|strong="H2319"\w* \w song|strong="H7892"\w* in my \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*, \add even\add* \w praise|strong="H8416"\w* unto our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: \w many|strong="H7227"\w* shall \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \add it\add*, and \w fear|strong="H3372"\w*, and shall \w trust|strong="H0982"\w* in the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

\w Blessed|strong="H0835"\w* \add is\add* that \w man|strong="H1397"\w* that \w maketh|strong="H7760"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* his \w trust|strong="H4009"\w*, and \w respecteth|strong="H6437"\w* not the \w proud|strong="H7295"\w*, nor such as turn \w aside|strong="H7750"\w* to \w lies|strong="H3577"\w*.

\w Many|strong="H7227"\w*, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* my \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \add are\add* thy \w wonderful|strong="H6381"\w* works \add which\add* thou hast \w done|strong="H6213"\w*, and thy \w thoughts|strong="H4284"\w* \add which are\add* to us-ward: they cannot be reckoned up in \w order|strong="H6186"\w* unto thee: \add if\add* I would \w declare|strong="H5046"\w* and \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \add of them\add*, they are \w more|strong="H6105"\w* than can be \w numbered|strong="H5608"\w*.\f + \fr 40.5 \ft they cannot…: or, none can order them unto thee\f*

\w Sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w* and \w offering|strong="H4503"\w* thou didst not \w desire|strong="H2654"\w*; mine \w ears|strong="H0241"\w* hast thou \w opened|strong="H3738"\w*: burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w* and sin \w offering|strong="H2401"\w* hast thou not \w required|strong="H7592"\w*.\f + \fr 40.6 \ft opened: Heb. digged\f*
Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* I, Lo, I \w come|strong="H0935"\w*: in the \w volume|strong="H4039"\w* of the \w book|strong="H5612"\w* \add it is\add* \w written|strong="H3789"\w* of me,

I \w delight|strong="H2654"\w* to \w do|strong="H6213"\w* thy \w will|strong="H7522"\w*, O my \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: yea, thy \w law|strong="H8451"\w* \add is\add* \w within|strong="H8432"\w* my \w heart|strong="H4578"\w*.\f + \fr 40.8 \ft within…: Heb. in the midst of my bowels\f*

I have \w preached|strong="H1319"\w* \w righteousness|strong="H6664"\w* in the \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w congregation|strong="H6951"\w*: lo, I have not \w refrained|strong="H3607"\w* my \w lips|strong="H8193"\w*, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, thou \w knowest|strong="H3045"\w*.

I have not \w hid|strong="H3680"\w* thy \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w* \w within|strong="H8432"\w* my \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*; I have \w declared|strong="H0559"\w* thy \w faithfulness|strong="H0530"\w* and thy \w salvation|strong="H8668"\w*: I have not \w concealed|strong="H3582"\w* thy \w lovingkindness|strong="H2617"\w* and thy \w truth|strong="H0571"\w* from the \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w congregation|strong="H6951"\w*.

\w Withhold|strong="H3607"\w* not thou thy tender \w mercies|strong="H7356"\w* from me, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: let thy \w lovingkindness|strong="H2617"\w* and thy \w truth|strong="H0571"\w* \w continually|strong="H8548"\w* \w preserve|strong="H5341"\w* me.

For \w innumerable|strong="H4557"\w* \w evils|strong="H7451"\w* have \w compassed|strong="H0661"\w* me about: mine \w iniquities|strong="H5771"\w* have taken \w hold|strong="H5381"\w* upon me, so that I am not \w able|strong="H3201"\w* to look \w up|strong="H7200"\w*; they are \w more|strong="H6105"\w* than the \w hairs|strong="H8185"\w* of mine \w head|strong="H7218"\w*: therefore my \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w faileth|strong="H5800"\w* me.\f + \fr 40.12 \ft faileth: Heb. forsaketh\f*

Be \w pleased|strong="H7521"\w*, O 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, to \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* me: O 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, make \w haste|strong="H2363"\w* to \w help|strong="H5833"\w* me.

Let them be \w ashamed|strong="H0954"\w* and \w confounded|strong="H2659"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w* that \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* after my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* to \w destroy|strong="H5595"\w* it; let them be \w driven|strong="H5472"\w* \w backward|strong="H0268"\w* and put to \w shame|strong="H3637"\w* that \w wish|strong="H2655"\w* me \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*.

Let them be \w desolate|strong="H8074"\w* for a \w reward|strong="H6118"\w* of their \w shame|strong="H1322"\w* that \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto me, \w Aha|strong="H1889"\w*, \w aha|strong="H1889"\w*.

Let all those that \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* thee \w rejoice|strong="H7797"\w* and be \w glad|strong="H8055"\w* in thee: let such as \w love|strong="H0157"\w* thy \w salvation|strong="H8668"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w* \w continually|strong="H8548"\w*, The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* be \w magnified|strong="H1431"\w*.

But I \add am\add* \w poor|strong="H6041"\w* and \w needy|strong="H0034"\w*; \add yet\add* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \w thinketh|strong="H2803"\w* upon me: thou \add art\add* my \w help|strong="H5833"\w* and my \w deliverer|strong="H6403"\w*; make no \w tarrying|strong="H0309"\w*, O my \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.
